welcome_message_body: Welcome to Yangshe, China! Get ready to experience the charm of this picturesque city known for its beautiful gardens, ancient temples, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Yangshe has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Small Devil
restaurants.description: The Small Devil is a italian restaurant located in Zhangjiagang.
restaurants.address: 42 Renmin M Rd | 人民中路42号, Zhangjiagang, 江苏

restaurants.name: Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅 (海底捞火锅)
restaurants.description: Haidilao Hot Pot 海底捞火锅 (海底捞火锅) is a hotpot restaurant located in 苏州.

restaurants.name: 어미향
restaurants.description: 어미향 is a korean restaurant located in Zhangjiagang.

restaurants.name: Pizza Hut (必胜客)
restaurants.description: Pizza Hut (必胜客) is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: McDonald's (麦当劳)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (麦当劳) is a fast food restaurant located in 张家港市.
restaurants.address: 东二环路 (乘航路), 张家港市, 江苏, 215000

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wuxi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Wuxi Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
